content: Friends, how is everyone? In the latest version of Zulip, oddly the spell-checker stopped working, both web and Windows app. Is there some setting I should check? Language is set to English. Thanks.

This is generally a browser or OS change -- I'm not aware of any changes in this on the server side recently.

What browser are you using?

The Windows app is secretly just a Chrome browser.

I assume you're not seeing it work on this server for you?
Screenshot-2023-03-08-at-1.12.58-PM.png

image.png
maybe incognito mode in my browser... to see if some extension, something is affecting?

Did you take any Windows updates recently?

Zulip doesn't have a spell checker. We always rely on the browser's.

Browsers are generally a lot better at it than we could be. :smile:

For the Zulip desktop app, can you verify that you have the spell checker enabled in Settings → General → Functionality → Enable spellchecker (requires restart), and you have an appropriate language selected in Spellchecker Languages below that?

(For the browser, it’s entirely up to your browser as Alex said.)
